name: RISOTTO VERDE
description: Arborio rice with green beans, peas, green peppers, spinach and courgettes in its own stock with parmesan cheese and a hint of chilli and garlic.

name: RISOTTO ALFREDO
description: Arborio rice with mushrooms and chicken in a light creamy sauce.

name: RISOTTO SAFFRON
description: Arborio rice with garlic, onions, chicken and mixed peppers cooked in a creamy saffron sauce.

name: RISOTTO AL SALMON GAMBERI
description: Arborio rice with fresh salmon, tiger prawns and baby prawns in a white wine, garlic cream sauce with a touch of tomato and cherry tomatoes.

name: RISOTTO CALAMARI E GAMBERI
description: Arborio rice with calamari, tiger prawns and baby prawns in a light tomato, garlic and white wine sauce with cream and a hint of chilli and cherry tomatoes.

name: RISOTTO AI FRUTTI DI MARE
description: Arborio rice with cherry tomatoes tiger prawns, mussels and mixed seafood in a white wine, garlic and a hint of chilli tomato sauce.

name: SPICY RISOTTO
description: Arborio rice with thin strips of beef and chicken cooked with onions, peppers and mushrooms in a red wine spicy tomato sauce and cherry tomatoes.

name: WILD MUSHROOM RISOTTO
description: Arborio rice with wild mushrooms with onions in a creamy garlic sauce.
